cause.description:
The Goal of this Cause is to push for political reforms in order to establish a more competent and Democratic system.
Issues to be addressed are:
Political Education
Corruption in campain financing
Voter mechanics
Improvement of voter turnouts
Improvement in the quantity and quality of political candidates.
1. The current government is riddled with corruption and flaws, and is in need of major reforms
